title: Park Hyatt Milan and Fiat Abarth cars redefine the ultimate guest experience
text:
Park Hyatt Milan and Fiat Abarth cars redefine the ultimate guest experience Park Hyatt Milan and Fiat Abarth cars redefine the ultimate guest experience Details Category: Hotel Created   14:15 Guests of the luxury five-star hotel can now tour Milan and surrounding areas without limits and in style behind the wheel of an Abarth 595 Turismo In occasion of Expo 2015, Park Hyatt Milan is excited to partner up with Fiat Abarth Cars to redefine the ultimate customer experience, offering guests of the luxury hotel the exclusive chance to tour the city of Milan and surrounding cities behind the wheel, in style. Until 31st October 2015, Park Hyatt Milan is offering guests exclusive access to two fully-loaded Abarth sports cars. Guests can now discover Italy’s most cosmopolitan city and charming surrounding areas with no limits, no boundaries, just the open road and the spirit of adventure. 
Park Hyatt Milan and Fiat Abarth are dedicated to offering even the most hard to please guests the most extraordinary lifestyle experiences, completely focusing on quality customer service and first-class hospitality. Car enthusiasts are invited to get behind the wheel of a 595 Turismo or 595 Turismo Cabrio – icons of Italian ingenuity and unsurpassed craftsmanship; the perfect blend of elegance, tradition, technology and cutting edge performance. Adding to this unique occasion, MIO, the elegant city hotel bar near Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, will host a series of four literary inspired aperitifs with special guests invited to talk about their experience within the world of Abarth. On 9th September 2015, Park Hyatt Milan is delighted to welcome former commander of the Frecce Tricolore and Ferrari Formula 1 team consultant, Massimo Tammaro, to the hotel who will present a look back at the evolution the iconic Scorpion craftsmanship of Fiat Abarth cars. Then on 30th September 2015, Alex Bellini, explorer and “mental coach” will delve into Abarth’s global success and performance. Following this, in October Abarth’s “technical upgrade” will be presented by successful producer and internationally acclaimed DJ, Stefano Fontana. The Cars The Abarth 595 Turismo is equipped with a 1.4 Turbo T-Jet engine with 160 hp. The Turismo model is aimed at those customers who identify with values as elegance and sportsmanship typical of "Gran Turismo". In addition to the manual five-speed transmission, automated sequential gearbox, with steering wheel controls, which enhances engine performance by reducing gearshift times. The "shift paddles" are positioned on the steering wheel. The Turismo series is characterized by meticulous attention to detail and offers customization options at the top of its class. The interior is personalized by the choice of high quality materials such as leather seats, with color options that can be made to match the steering wheel in perforated leather. The mats are embellished with leather inserts and studs fastening metal pedals, door sill and the gearbox trim are Alutex, a unique racing-derived composite material; everything in this series exudes sophistication and allure to meet and surpass customer needs. This initiative is part of the activities planned for Expo Milano 2015, of which FCA and CNH Industrial are the Official Global Partners. Nightly rates at Park Hyatt Milano start from 490 Euros/£356* per room. Related articles
